response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. I understand its significance and would like to offer you the opportunity to own it at an exclusive price tailored for you. My proposal is to extend a special offer of $1,200,000 for this exceptional item. This price not only reflects its true worth but also provides you with a significant saving compared to its market value. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations and budget. I am confident that this product will bring immense satisfaction and benefit to you. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
